19.text: We just got word that another rhino has been mutilated and left for dead in the Eastern Cape.

23.text:
We're on our way up there now,
there is a group of vets on the ground

27.text:
working day and night to try and save her life, 
and as a photojournalist I feel so strongly

31.text:
that we need to share their stories and
show the world what has happened to these animals.

37.text: It happened some time during the Friday night.

39.text: I only saw her after they got her out of the bush,

43.text:
we realised that the horn was gone.
I can't explain the emotions

48.text: that went through everybody with that wound.

52.text: For me the most important reason why we're doing this

55.text: is for us to learn how to treat these wounds.

58.text:
If this does work, then we can say
yes we can save them.

62.text: Today we are just going to evaluate the wound

64.text: we will flush it, clean it

65.text:
and then we brought a new
shield which we will fasten to the wound.

68.text:
This is the first time that we will use
this technique.

89.text:
thank the Lord for people like
Saving the Survivors

92.text: and then my next feeling was

94.text:
every time that they drilled
that hole into her head

99.text: I just wanted to close my eyes and say

101.text:
I don't want to hear that,
I don't want to hear that.

103.text:
You must feel it,
it must be so sore.

106.text: This was really a very emotional experience

119.text: and, you know to see what they go through.

125.text: Hope, to me is like one of my kids

128.text:
I can't wait at night and 
in the morning

130.text:
to see what Saving The Survivors
are saying about her.

134.text:
We're looking forward for her to come home.
I'm sorry.

141.text:
We're losing animals now.
We lost 3% of Africa's rhino last year

145.text: We need the awareness and the resources

148.text: of people right across the world

149.text:
to fight this war,
and to save this species.

154.text: These animals are being hacked to death

157.text:
if the were human beings,
we'd call this genocide.
